channel.title: Staticons help
channel.description: I've found the red stones, side icons, etc. in the client class, I just can't find the stat icons so I can put new ones in. Anyone know where to put the stat icons at and not using Tom's Cache Editor?

item.title: Staticons help
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

Do you have a sprits folder? i beleive they are in there, but my client doesn’t have one so i use toms cache suite to edit my cache easily, get that and its self explanitory

Read full topic

item.title: Staticons help

item.description:
